Texts.Eng: A sturdy bed, made by the Skath.
Texts.Chs: 一张结实的床，由绘世者制作。

Texts.Eng: Despite the industry that made this bed, it's somehow less comfortable than hay.
Texts.Chs: 尽管这张床是由工业制造的，但不知何故它不如干草舒适。

Texts.Eng: It appears that this bed has an inbuilt heating function.
Texts.Chs: 这张床似乎具有内置的加热功能。

Texts.Eng: Looks better suited as a barricade than a bed.
Texts.Chs: 看起来更适合作为路障而不是床。

Texts.Eng: Looks like someone put a towel over a metal table and called it a bed.
Texts.Chs: 看起来有人把毛巾放在一张金属桌子上，把它叫做床。

Texts.Eng: Plain and ugly. I'd sooner sleep on the floor than in a bed like this.
Texts.Chs: 朴素而丑陋。我宁愿睡在地板上也不愿睡在这样的床上。

Texts.Eng: This Skath-made bed has inbuilt hydrolium circuits that can adjust the temperature of the bed.
Texts.Chs: 这款绘世者床内置有可调节床温的水解回路。

Texts.Eng: This bed looks quite industrial. It doesn't look very comfortable.
Texts.Chs: 这张床看起来很工业化。看起来不太舒服。

Texts.Eng: Waterdragon bed looks hard and sssturdy. Makesss good hiding ssspot!
Texts.Chs: 水龙床看起来又硬又结实。这是个好地方！
